channel.title: CVE Feed for The GNU C Library -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for The GNU C Library -- all products

item.title: CVE-2024-2961|2024-04-17T17:51:03.169Z -- the%20gnu%20c%20library -- glibc
item.description: The iconv() function in the GNU C Library versions 2.39 and older may overflow the output buffer passed to it by up to 4 bytes when converting strings to the ISO-2022-CN-EXT character set, which may be used to crash an application or overwrite a neighbouring variable.
